Author: FridgethatRidge
Text: Passing out is both a fear and a goal for me. On one hand, I want to pass out so I'll finally be, "sick enough" to have a real ed. But on the other hand, I don't want people to worry, and I dont want to hurt myself while falling, (also I'm insecure about looking fat when I pass out and im afraid I'll look so stupid ppl will laugh at me) another fear is that I'll pass out while I'm holding my violin and I'll break my violin, (is a handmade stradivarius copy so I really dont want anything bad to happen to it)

Author: damnitjanet6
Text: I know the feeling- first time I passed out I was standing on my bed trying to bodycheck myself and I fainted and cracked my head on the side of my scale. My scale broke lol. I felt so weird about it, scared but so proud.  You can get electrolyte powder on amazon that you can put in water and drink to help balance your electrolytes out, zero calorie stuff- I recommend it for damage control .. look after yourself please ♥️
